There are three light switches outside a room. One of them controls a light bulb inside the room. The door to the room is closed, and you cannot see whether the light is on or off until you open the door. You can play around with the switches as much as you like, but once you open the door, you cannot touch the switches anymore. How can you figure out which switch controls the light bulb?
options: Turn on one switch, wait a few minutes, then turn it off and turn another switch on before entering the room.
Turn on all the switches, wait a few minutes, then turn two off before entering the room.
Turn on one switch, wait a few minutes, then turn on another switch and enter the room immediately.
Turn on one switch, wait a few minutes, then turn it off and turn another one on. Wait a few more minutes, turn off the second switch, turn on the third switch, and then enter the room.
correctAnswer: Turn on one switch, wait a few minutes, then turn it off and turn another switch on before entering the room.
